Articles.Content:
Just another FAR F22 Raptor painted gold with a B9-Procedural/Infernal Robotics internal weapon bay.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/V8DQa)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-57odIs3w0w?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
I don't know why, but the gatling guns poking out of the front of this thing make it my favorite F-22 replica of all time:D

Rep

and nicely done on the plane, maybe you could try and colour it like a grey ish color
